entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
